Introduction

Yeo Changgu, better known as Yeo One, is a South Korean singer and actor best known as the lead vocalist of PENTAGON. Before debuting, he gained early recognition as a trainee by appearing in music videos such as G.NA’s Secret.

Yeo One debuted with PENTAGON on October 10, 2016, with the mini-album PENTAGON. In January 2024, he joined Mnet’s reality survival show Build Up: Vocal Boy Group Survivor as a contestant. On May 28, 2024, he announced that he had begun his mandatory military service.
